Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Padiamun or Padiamunnebnesuttawy with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with ears and a beard, large joined hands in relief holding the string of the black painted seed-basket that hangs over one shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
